title: How to get the Alpha Tester icon?
body:
If a Rioter could perhaps offer any assistance, that would be much appreciated.

I made my account on the Legacy client and then re-opened it on the Alpha client, but have yet to receive the icon.
Am I perhaps ineligible due to not playing games or being too late?

replies.body: The Alpha Tester Icon was given out to anyone who logged into and used the Alpha Client *prior* to it moving to the *Beta Stage*, which it is currently at now. Did you receive Alpha Access and log in any time within the last few months (excluding this month)?
